<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge = std::make&#95;pair(U.getFrom(), U.getTo());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because it is illegal to submit updates that have already been applied</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and updates to an edge need to be strictly ordered,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it is safe to infer the existence of an edge from the first update</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to this edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the first update to an edge is &quot;Delete&quot;, it means that the edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// existed before. If the first update to an edge is &quot;Insert&quot;, it means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the edge didn&#39;t exist before.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, if the user submits &#123;&#123;Delete, A, B&#125;, &#123;Insert, A, B&#125;&#125;,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 it is illegal to submit updates that have already been applied,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i.e., user cannot delete an nonexistent edge,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 updates to an edge need to be strictly ordered,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So, initially edge A -&gt; B existed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can then safely ignore future updates to this edge and directly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inspect the current CFG:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a. If the edge still exists, because the user cannot insert an existent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edge, so both &#123;Delete, A, B&#125;, &#123;Insert, A, B&#125; actually happened and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resulted in a no-op. DTU won&#39;t submit any update in this case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// b. If the edge doesn&#39;t exist, we can then infer that &#123;Delete, A, B&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// actually happened but &#123;Insert, A, B&#125; was an invalid update which never</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// happened. DTU will submit &#123;Delete, A, B&#125; in this case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a5c325f9e45c085ee9757538409359e21">isSelfDominance</a>(U) &amp;&amp; Seen.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Edge).second) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the update doesn&#39;t appear in the CFG, it means that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// either the change isn&#39;t made or relevant operations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result in a no-op.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ac69f0f33bd155d164f8f39c96647c413">isUpdateValid</a>(U)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#afce0c05f1246398130114d3744926871">isLazy</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ad09768c934fd481e5a641cc327d1a5cb">PendUpdates</a>.push&#95;back(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">          DeduplicatedUpdates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a6c1229274a768152e5ed6af3872af602">Strategy</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a2655b89361decf2c1493792dc14e5a56a46a9ebdb80117bfa1f0cdea65438290a">UpdateStrategy::Lazy</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> printBlockInfo = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Ending) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since isUpdateValid() must be called &#42;after&#42; the Terminator of From is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or invalid for a single update.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bail out early if there is nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT || Edges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#ac835b8735b1b2faec0efdca236e37d94">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remember all the basic blocks that are inserted during</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edge splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invariant: NewBBs == all the basic blocks contained in the NewBB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// field of all the elements of Edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// I.e., forall elt in Edges, it exists BB in NewBBs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// such as BB == elt.NewBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlockT &#42;, 32&gt;</a> NewBBs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Edge.NewBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each element in Edges, remember whether or not element</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is the new immediate domminator of its successor. The mapping is done by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// index, i.e., the information for the ith element of Edges is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the ith element of IsNewIDom.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallbitvector">SmallBitVector</a> IsNewIDom(Edges.size(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect all the dominance properties info, before invalidating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the underlying DT.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Edge&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Edges)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update dominator information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">    BasicBlockT &#42;Succ = Edge.ToBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SuccDTNode = DT-&gt;getNode(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BasicBlockT &#42;PredBB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(Succ)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredBB == Edge.NewBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are in this situation:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FromBB1        FromBB2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    +              +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   + +            + +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  +   +          +   +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...  Split1  Split2 ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           +   +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            + +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            Succ</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Instead of checking the domiance property with Split2, we check it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with FromBB2 since Split2 is still unknown of the underlying DT</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#ae04ad615dfdd885e85cbddda146787c6">contains</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f211484edf604716a6c80030b0a0375">pred&#95;size</a>(PredBB) == 1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;A basic block resulting from a &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;critical edge split has more &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;than one predecessor!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredBB = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3e549d97549636a7f08779d5cd98540">pred&#95;begin</a>(PredBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT-&gt;dominates(SuccDTNode, DT-&gt;getNode(PredBB))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">        IsNewIDom&#91;Idx&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now, update DT with the collected dominance properties info.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Edge&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Edges)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know FromBB dominates NewBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;NewDTNode = DT-&gt;addNewBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If all the other predecessors of &quot;Succ&quot; are dominated by &quot;Succ&quot; itself</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then the new block is the new immediate dominator of &quot;Succ&quot;. Otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the new block doesn&#39;t dominate anything.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsNewIDom&#91;Idx&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">      DT-&gt;changeImmediateDominator(DT-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB), NewDTNode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Post dominator tree is different, the new basic block in critical edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may become the new root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DerivedT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DomTreeT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PostDomTreeT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater">GenericDomTreeUpdater&lt;DerivedT, DomTreeT, PostDomTreeT&gt;::</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater">splitPDTCriticalEdges</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CriticalEdge&gt;</a> Edges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bail out early if there is nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PDT || Edges.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;UpdateT&gt; Updates;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Insert, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">    Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Insert, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">      Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Delete, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
